member.summary: Converts an excel file into a DataTable

member.name: M:Drawbridge.SalesforceAccountReconciliation.Services.ReconciliationReportHelperService.ToDictionary(System.Data.DataTable,System.Int32)
member.summary: Converts DataTable object to dictionary
member.param: DataTable to convert into dictionary containing all orgs and associated data
Column in DataTable that contains each organization's name
member.returns: Dictionary with key for organization name and value for all associated data

member.summary: Performs exact matching and fuzzy matching between Salesforce, Preqin, and HFM
member.param: Dictionary with values of each organization's name, and keys of all rows of data associated from Salesforce
Dictionary with values of each organization's name, and keys of all rows of data associated from Preqin
Dictionary with values of each organization's name, and keys of all rows of data associated from HFM
member.returns: List of 6 lists of data: Preqin exact matches, HFM exact matches, Preqin fuzzy matches, HFM fuzzy matches, all orgs that didn't match, and Salesforce data with a column at the front indicating which list each organization in Salesforce mapped to

member.name: M:Drawbridge.SalesforceAccountReconciliation.Services.ReconciliationReportHelperService.MakeHeader(System.Data.DataTable,System.String)
member.summary: Creates file header based on old file header
member.param: new columns of file header (appended to start)

member.param: Column index of each organization's website
Column index of each organization's email
